required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Systemic Lupus Erythematosus Within the Framework of the Multidisciplinary Consultation
clinical_study.official_title: Cohort Follow-up of Systemic Lupus Erythematosus Within the Framework of the Multidisciplinary Consultation at the CHRU of Brest

brief_summary.textblock: Diagnosis and follow up of a lupus cohort in a multidisciplinary consultation in Brest ( France)

detailed_description.textblock: all patients coming to the LUPUS multidisciplinary consultation in brest ( France) will have a clinical examination, a biological and immunogical blood samples, cutaneous biopsies or renal biospies if necessary, an ultrasonographic articular and salivary glandular examination if needed. In case of articular involvement, some Xrays ( hands and feet) will be done at the inclusion and during the follow up each year during 5 years .

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: diagnosis and follow up of a lupus cohort

primary_outcome.measure: Cohort lupus: epidemiologic lupus study about diagnosis and follow up
primary_outcome.description: epidemiologic lupus study in collecting data ( description of the population, biologic and immunologic data collection, data of articular damges with xrays datas) about Diagnosis and follow up of a cohort lupus in a multidisciplibnary consultation in brest hospital ( France).

arm_group.description: it is a descrption lupus patients study

intervention.intervention_name: description of a lupus patient cohort
intervention.description: description of a lupus patient cohort

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- women or men, more than 18 years old, coming to the multidisciplinary consultation in brest ( France).
- With written consentment
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients less than 18 years old
- refusing to participate
- Under legal protection

patient_data.ipd_description: All collected data that underlie results in a publication
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: Data will be available after the publication of result and ending fifteen years following the last visit of the last patient
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: Data access requests will be reviewed by the internal committee of Brest UH. Requestors will be required to sign and complete a data access agreement
